meanings.definition: A lossless format for image files that supports both animated and static images.
meanings.sent1: I love sharing gifs of cute animals with my friends.
meanings.sent2: She saved the funny gif to her computer for later.
meanings.sent3: The gif of the dancing cat always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a gif, repeating joyfully in the room.
meanings.sent5: The gif of the sunset was so clear, it felt like I was there.

meanings.sent1: He learned how to gif his favorite scenes from the movie.
meanings.sent2: She wanted to gif the funny moment to share with her friends.
meanings.sent3: I will gif the best parts of the video for a fun compilation.
meanings.sent4: His fingers moved quickly to gif the perfect moment.
meanings.sent5: She could gif the memory in a way that would last forever.

meanings.sent1: The gif on the website was so cool.
meanings.sent2: He sent her a gif of a birthday cake with candles.
meanings.sent3: The gif of the fireworks was a burst of color on the screen.
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the gif was frozen in time, yet full of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The gif of the waterfall was so realistic, it felt like I could hear the water.
